statements: SELECT * FROM user_roles;
SELECT user_id, permission_level, role_id FROM user_roles;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE permission_level > 2;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 'abcd-1234-efgh-5678';
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_roles ORDER BY permission_level DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id, permission_level FROM user_roles WHERE permission_level > 2;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT role_id FROM user_roles WHERE permission_level = 1;
SELECT user_id, MAX(permission_level) FROM user_roles GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_name ASC;
SELECT permission_name, description FROM permissions WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT permission_name, description FROM permissions WHERE permission_name='admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT permission_id, permission_name, description FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM roles INNER JOIN permissions ON roles.role_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@domain.com';
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT * FROM user_roles;
SELECT role_name, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name ASC;
SELECT permission_name, description FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_id DESC;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles r ON u.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id LEFT JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM user_roles;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 3;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_name LIKE 'Admin%';

SELECT u.user_id, u.username, ur.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.role_id = ur.role_id JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM user_roles;
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id AS id, role AS role_name FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM user_roles;
SELECT role FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_name DESC;
SELECT role_id, COUNT(*) AS num_permissions FROM role_permissions GROUP BY role_id HAVING num_permissions > 3;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_role_mapping JOIN user_roles ON user_role_mapping.role_id = user_roles.user_id;
